Donald Trump: s statement at a rally in Texas where he referred to MS-13 gang members as people who "carve you up with a knife."
Trump: s use of the word "invasion" to describe immigrants in multiple rallies and tweets.
Joe Biden: s claim that Trump "asserted that immigrants would quote, ‘carve you up with a knife’" during a campaign stop in Iowa.
The fact: check finding that Trump's statement about carving with a knife was directed specifically at MS-13 gang members, not all immigrants.
